I modified the NEAT Matlab code to perform the NEAT+Q algorithm, it 
doesn'=
t quite work yet though.

I spoke with Shimon and he basically told me that=
 the fitness 
function has to be positive.  He also said "If the  
domain i=
s stochastic, then the fitness function will be noisy and you 
probably wan=
t to average each network's performance across many  
trials to get a good =
fitness estimate."
